name: EVE Vanguard
description: EVE Vanguard is an MMOFPS set in the deep, persistent, far-future universe of New Eden. As an elite mercenary whose ground operations directly influence the massive player-driven conflicts taking place in space above, every deployment, resource gathered, and battle fought will contribute to the ever-evolving war and narrative of New Eden.

name: Elven Dreams
description: Welcome to this elven-infused world, where you'll be free to capture the elves you want, control them into battle, level them up and evolve, and finally fuse into that unique "strongest elven"!

name: Space Rocks!
description: Game is tribute to the classic Atari 1979 arcade game in which player tries to survive through waves of various obstacles and enemies. How long can you survive?

name: Astral Divide
description: You wakeup alone in a damaged spaceship. With no memories and only radio communications with HQ, you will have to investigate what is going on here. But survival comes first: gather resources, build a spaceship out of gear and steam and explore hand-crafted planets with unique biomes and resources.

name: 52Hertz
description: You, who's had enough of getting old with nothing accomplishedIt's been completely destroyed by an incidentWe head to the coastal island village [Mangyeongdo] which is famous for its suicide attraction.

name: Apex Rush
description: Race, Drift & Stunt in this physics-based arcade racing game! Build and share your own tracks with the world and top the leaderboards!

name: In Darkness We Hide
description: In Darkness We Hide is a multiplayer hide an seek game where you try to hide in the dark to avoid the hunters but stay in the light to prevent yourself from going insane.

name: We Need More Guns
description: Team up in 'We Need More Guns,' a 4-player co-op wave shooter with procedurally generated weapons. Dive into the heart of chaos as you and your friends face relentless waves.

name: Element Fighters
description: Element Fighters is the only third person multiplayer Arena-Shooter where you fight against players around the world using the four elements: Air, Earth, Water and Fire. Chose your nation and decide your destiny!

name: Kinstrife
description: Medieval RPG with revolutionary physics-based combat & strategic campaign. Become a wandering knight in a quest for fortune & glory, as you fight in duels, battles & tournaments. Build your wealth, equipment & following - and carve out your destiny in a realm of warring great houses and petty lords.

name: Dark and Evil
description: Dark & Evil is an Open World Action RPG game where players take on the role of a young and inexperienced Dark Lord. Fresh from a humbling defeat at the hands of humanity, the Dark Lord is fueled by the burning desire to conquer the human world and reclaim his rightful throne.

name: Solo
description: SoLo is a Sci-Fi third person shooter set on a hostile desert planet. Recruited to fight alongside an alien studying the planet, you must battle with a race of interplanetary poachers that are plundering the wildlife and natural resources

name: Hieroglyph Quest: The Amarna Enigma
description: Start learning Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphics now with this introductionary role playing game based on actual events from roughly 3500 years ago!

name: Nightbeast VR
description: Nightbeast is a VR shooter where players enter the criminal underworld, becoming skilled marksmen, and boldly confronting ruthless foes as they complete contracts and deliver justice.

name: Celestial Return
description: Celestial Return is a narrative driven Sci-Fi Noir RPG where you roll as 3 lost souls scheming the Heist of the Millennia. Roll the dice, mix and match your skills, make tough choices, and steal the "Titan Core" to rule a cyborg army!

name: Bear It
description: Can you handle this un-bear-able fast-paced FPS? Bear It is a highly replayable roguelite parkour movement shooter for agile players. Use parkour on the environment and even on your enemies to traverse the Ark’s platforms quickly and efficiently. Be prepared for the unexpected!

name: I Still Live Under Your House
description: You're a horrible monster living under someone's house.

name: Hexburg
description: Hexburg allows you to create a thriving medieval hexagonal grid based metropolis full of industry, trade, culture, and more!

name: Deckbuilder Fantasy
description: Embark on a thrilling deckbuilding adventure! Craft your strategy as you explore treacherous lands and face challenging foes. Discover a vast array of powerful cards and unique treasures, fighting your way to the final boss on a journey that's different every time.

name: Doomsday Beans
description: Doomsday Bean is an arcade game in the Bullet Hell genre. The player controls an armed car. You have several types of main weapons to choose from.

name: Cave Dweller
description: You wake up in the depths of a cave. Can you unravel all the mysteries of this place and find a way to freedom? This is an adventure where every decision could be the key to success.

name: Warzone Chronicles: Battlegrounds
description: Experience relentless multiplayer warfare in Warzone Chronicles: Battlegrounds. Choose diverse arenas, customize settings, and engage in strategic battles solo or with friends. Optional Perspectacles enhance immersion. Join the frontline, dominate in this epic FPS adventure.

name: Survive to Live!
description: This is a casual game that combines tower defense and survival, constantly gaining strength in a tidal wave of monsters. Combine tower defense trap river players to swim and survive.

name: Autostereocade
description: A small collection of autostereogram games

name: XXOO
description: A puzzle game for playdate console

name: Two To Match
description: Test your memory in this game of concentration and awareness! Click on two squares; find two of the same items and the squares disappear! Score high by clearing all the squares in the fewest clicks. Ready, set, Match!

name: Tricky Treat
description: An evil witch has cast a magical spell on the town of Mysteria. Strange possessed pumpkins and animals have been sighted on rooftops. Use physics to save Mysteria from the deadly curse and free the trapped spirits to restore peace and tranquility.

name: Tour Du Monde
description: In this hidden object game, travel the world as you look for objects scattered in various locations. Travel through picturesque scenes from some of the most memorable places, and find every hidden object to win!

name: Topplz
description: Go through a collection of fun and challenging levels in this ever addictive physics game. Go hurtling through the air and bounce off the trampolines to bring down all the standing blocks, and collect trophies in each level!

name: Sudoku Classic
description: Sudoku is an addictive puzzle the world over! A grid divided into nine 3x3 boxes have a few numbers inserted to begin with. Fill the empty spaces so that the numbers 1-9 appear only once in each row, column and 3x3 box.

name: Close Quarters
description: Sin descripción

name: Germ Killer
description: Clone of the Flash game Happy Pill. The player must aim a pill to hit frowning faces until they smile; if the pill hits the same face too many times, it will disturbingly "die" and turn into a skull. A VT368 hack of the game was also produced (under the same name). Later re-published by Waixing; the Waixing version uses a weirdly off-putting rendition of the theme to Gentlemen of Fortune, a Soviet comedy film.

name: Magical Kitchen
description: Clone of the Flash game Tomato Bounce; most graphics are retained from the original. The player must catch the fruits and vegetables as they jump off of the counter. A VT368 hack of the game was also produced (under the same name). Later re-published by Waixing; the Waixing version uses what is possibly a rendition of the Rugrats theme.

name: Mad Xmas
description: Sin descripción

name: Trooper
description: Sin descripción

name: Pop Monster
description: The player must jump to the platform above them, similar to Nice Code's Frantic Mouse. A VT368 hack of the game was also produced (titled "Jump Mouse"). Later re-published by Waixing.

name: Water Fire
description: Clone of the Flash game Toon Marooned: Protect the Fire; the Looney Tunes characters are replaced with a generic rabbit and dog. The player (the rabbit) must sink the dog's fire rafts in the water, without sinking theirs.

name: Once First-Person Adventure
description: Once First-Person Adventure is a first-person action adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic setting. As a volunteer, you go to conduct an unscheduled inspection of power plant points.

name: Horizon Springs
description: Live your dreams in Horizon Springs – an open world of limitless possibilities. Build, explore, and shape your destiny in alternate paradise. Make a name for yourself in Horizon Springs.

name: Aero Engine
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Cabra
description: Sin descripción

name: Venturer Plug 'n' Play
description: A dedicated console with 25 "original" games. Most of the games were usually found in other Famiclones.

name: Star Deck
description: Explore the galaxy in Star Deck, a deckuilding sci-fi roguelite RPG! Rescue your brother from the Federation, an uncompromising totalitarian presence that rules the galaxy with an iron fist.

name: Hannah VCR
description: Solve the mysteries that are locked within Hannah's videotapes by changing the order and color of obstacles inside a retro videogame.

name: Gombo
description: Explore, build, fight and survive in an enchanting cartoon world! Take control of Gombo, your very own animated character, and adventure through a beautiful, yet unforgiving world full of dangers and surprises.

name: Six Orders
description: A retro turn-based tactics game where you have to find the one simulation to save the earth from its impending death. Control your army of robots to fight TERRAs on their mission to destroy the last remaining chance of terrestrial life.

name: Undead Mayhem
description: Undead Mayhem is a survival horror fps game where you will try to survive for as long as possible while fighting waves of bloodthirsty monsters coming to kill you!

name: The Last Catalyst
description: Delve into this real-time roguelike deckbuilder mixed with an auto-battler. Find powerful synergies, improve your spells, collect artifacts and skills, and climb your way through swarms of enemies until you face the final boss!

name: Sick
description: Embark on a chilling journey that blurs the lines between reality and illusion and a mystery shrouded in darkness. Featuring beautiful pixel art, a bespoke soundtrack and a story that will leave you ... sick.

name: Wizard's Beard
description: Explore locations, fight enemies, cast spells, and repeat! What more could you want in a game?

name: MetroSim: The Subway Simulator
description: Explore Warsaw Metro in "MetroSim: The Subway Simulator." Drive trains, control tickets, and enjoy multiplayer realism. Rise through ranks, face challenges, and dive into the subway adventure now!

name: Mai In The Mysterious Castle
description: Mai In The Mysterious Castle is a third-person adventure, dark atmospheric puzzle game

name: Profound
description: A quirky action RPG made by only one person. Collect gold & loot. Upgrade weapons and armor. Kill enemies and level up your skills.

name: Tales of Three Kingdoms: The Mortal World
description: Dou Fu, who has always tried to live a low-key life in the chaotic period, gets involved in different events after meeting the “Princess” from the Han Dynasty. The choices he makes will lead them to different endings…

name: Stop Those Aliens!
description: An alien fleet intent on destroying us has landed on our planet. It is your job to thwart the invasion by strategically placing towers on their route towards our base. Use the money you've earned and plant special towers with unique abilities to eliminate the enemy threat!

name: Stick Tennis
description: Stick Tennis comes to IFE! Chip and charge as you beat top seeds in fast tempo tennis matches. Serve aces; drop volley and display exemplary footwork while working for an advantage. Rally up for game point!

name: Spotlight
description: In the darkness of a cold labyrinth, a lone spotlight guides you on your quest for lost treasure. You must find the treasure before your enemies. Use the power-ups hidden in the maze to defeat your opponents and retrieve the fortune to win!

name: Solitaire Classic
description: Indulge yourself in a classic game of Solitaire! Keep your eye on the clock as you try to arrange the cards in sequence. Open columns and transfer cards in sequence to the four stacks. It's not as easy as it sounds!

name: Travel Cat: Adventure Island
description: Build your farm island, Grow crops and animals, Explore the island, Mining for Gold and Minerals , Gather resources , Exchange furniture.

name: MythWars & Puzzles
description: Welcome to MythWars & Puzzles. Immerse yourself in the fantasy world with magic and lore. You will take on the role of a mighty Lord that have been chosen to join an unprecedented war against the evil gods. It is time to construct your magical city, train a massive army and recruit legendary heroes. This very unique and attractive RPG game uses the classic match-3 puzzle to drive the power of the gods into your army as they charge into the enemies fearlessly, and get rid of all the evil.

name: Super Reaktor
description: Super reaKtor is a fast-paced Bullet Hell with original controls, where you must survive by collecting green energy pellets, and avoid or absorb various types of hostile TRI-SKL bullets.

name: Frogger
description: An exclusive port of Frogger for the Atari Flashback series. It is based on the Atari 2600 architecture.

name: Curiosity Killed the Explorer
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket League: Painted Paragon Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Knight Versus Demon
description: In Knight Versus Demon a VR player controls a villainous demon battling against a tiny stoic hero played by a local friend on the PC.

name: Death Front
description: Death Front is a first-person shooter with supernatural elements. Team up in parties of four to uncover the mystery behind a series of gruesome murders while being haunted by ghosts. Do you have what it takes to face these sinister forces?

name: Sp(l/r)ite
description: When you wake up, you are in a different space. "Sp(l/r)ite" is an adventure game in which you must cooperate with your neighbors and a vivacious goddess, separated by walls, to escape from a room floating in a different space, while solving riddles. Which door will you choose when you get there?

name: X8: Japan Only Version
description:
The next generation in Hero Shooters!

Executing its directive to assemble worthy opponents, the rogue mod X8 has collected characters from across different game franchises. Players embody a variety of heroes and engage in 5v5 VR battles to restore a path back to their worlds.

name: Dragon Front Rising
description: Challenge players online or solo with Conquest mode in this immersive collectible card-battler. Dragon Front Rising mixes high fantasy with World War II on a 4x4 grid battlefield that is alive with rampaging giants, intimidating war-machines, and soaring projectiles.

name: Bolt Action Stealth
description: Steady your aim. Silence is your cover. Exterminate from afar with realistic gun mechanics and long-range bullet physics in this suspenseful, first-person, alien-eradicating sniper puzzle game.

name: Scuba Pop
description: Colorful bubbles are full of treasure! Aim and shoot to clear bubbles by matching colors and resurface with your loot!

name: Pop Stop
description: The Mask of Magic is in your possession. The tribals are looking to steal it from you. Protect the mask at all costs while using hand-made weapons and special abilities. Shop for upgrades to improve your abilities as the tribals get stronger each wave.

name: Pic-Fix
description: Good at bringing order to chaos? Jump in and unravel the real picture from the scramble of pieces.

name: Octo-push
description: Octo-Sam is determined to circle the world! Help him on his journey by launching him through the air while occasionally latching on to gliders, planes and various other power-ups. Travel as far as you can in this addictive distance game.

name: Hue Drops
description: Feast your eyes on this vibrant and colourful puzzle game! Colour the entire board the shade of the target colour, and score combo bonuses.Use power-ups in challenging puzzles to complete all the levels before you run out of turns!

name: A-Girl: New Character A
description: A new character！

name: Twin Gods
description: Twin Gods is a turn-based JRPG. Join Nothik in his fight against a dying world on the orders of his missing father. Upgrade gear, open barrels, combo spells together, discover items, overcome your town bully, learn the world's ancient history, and battle a really confused turtle.

name: Delta
description: Dynamic and colorful first-person battles with alien creatures, spectacular parkour, exploration of mysterious locations in the atmosphere of space science fiction. Become a ruthless killing machine and free Delta Station from the invasion.

name: Eternity's Echo: Patient Zero
description: Eternity's Echo: Patient Zero takes place at a gas station in Winona, Arizona. Rayne Williams is a D.I.B Agent sent to investigate the strange occurrences at this gas station along Route 66. Join the story through Rayne's perspective as she tries to fulfill her mission amidst the challenges she encounters on the station's premises!

name: Atomic Titans: Light Violence
description: Embark on a cosmic journey with Atomic Titans: Light Violence, an action-packed casual combat game. Engage in heart-pounding showdowns within the confines of space faring arenas.

name: Hidden Object Hunt
description: Find objects hidden across the screen from the list provided. Spot all the objects as quickly as you can in an extremely competitive multiplayer mode that will take you through a host of familiar settings to explore!

name: Gravitwist
description: Jump over pools of boiling lava and avoid spikes to complete each level – all the while walking across walls and ceilings.

name: Fruit Strike!
description: Aim high in this juicy game as you try to strike clusters of fruit and break them up before they pile up into a fruity heap!

name: Famine Way
description: Famine Way is a 2D adventure game in the author's hand-drawn style, which unfolds Holodomor in 1932-1933. Go on a journey, experiencing all the tragedy through the eyes of little Olena and her companion - a wounded stork!

name: Nightmare Nursery
description: An old-school retro stylised horror where you play as an urban explorer called Elizabeth, who has been intrigued by rumours regarding an abandoned nursery, with claims of hauntings and disappearances, now hidden by towering trees, left to be nothing but a forgotten memory in the public's eye.

name: FooFee
description: Foo and Fee are stranded on an uninhabited planet and they need your help! Help them work together by controlling their jump to survive the treacherous obstacles that block their path in this endless survival game.

name: Fish Fighter
description: Get ready to eat, or be eaten! Venture into the spectacular ocean and eat as many fish as you can in this aquatic adventure. Eat the required number of fish to progress through the levels. If you like sea food, you're in for a treat!

name: Eye2Eye
description: The lonely eyes are missing their mates. Draw a path between two eyes of the same color, while filling up the entire grid. Bring all the eyes together in the least possible attempts, as you try to score three stars in every level.

name: Exact
description: Ricochet your way to victory as you light up the screen with enchanting colors. Score EXACTLY what’s needed by bouncing off the coloured “Scoring objects”. Avoid obstacles, activate triggers and manipulate your speed in this physics puzzler!

name: Chess
description: Enjoy a completely new way to bowl. Try to make all the pins fall and compete against other players.

name: The Bowling Tournament
description: Enjoy a completely new way to bowl. Try to make all the pins fall and compete against other players.

name: Bird Vs Bird
description: Trapped! The evil birds are looking to trap you in their net of vines. You must use your wits to outsmart them in this puzzle game. Once you're done, play as the evil birds too as you try to trap the helpless red bird within the net to win!

name: 8 Ball Pool Classic
description: Get your chalk out, grab a pool cue and get ready to play a game of 8 ball pool. Pot balls of your colour group in any order, into any pocket with the black ball potted last to win the game.

name: Temporal Odyssey
description: Temporal Odyssey: Journey Through Time is an enigmatic adventure game that invites players into a mysterious journey across different epochs. Guiding the character Aylin, players will embark on unique explorations in various time periods, solving intricate puzzles and wielding the power to alter the fabric of time itself. The game delves beyond mere time travel, challenging players to shape the past and change the course of the future. Temporal Odyssey not only encompasses the thrill of temporal exploration but also encourages players to unravel the secrets of time, rewrite history, and craft their own epic temporal saga. Immerse yourself in this captivating experience that reveals time travel as an unpredictable and surprise-laden adventure.

name: Livets Hopp
description: Playdate game about escaping the inevitable.

name: Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Starbreed
description: Starbreed is inspired by classic 3D rail shooters with a dating sim twist. Each ally you unlock comes with a passive and active ability to add to your kit. Bring them in your party to raise their affinity, and unlock Hscenes with them.

name: Superpersons University
description: The game to end all games. Superpersons University is a comedy deckbuilder game. Compete with one of the Superpersons to get a date with another Superperson, but you don't know who the other suitor is. Discover your nemesis, foil their plans, and get the date. (This is not an erotic game.)

name: Paradox Guardians
description: Paradox Guardians is a real-time adult RPG where you play as an alien Time Traveler who arrives on Earth and must conquer the planet.

name: Reiwa Outliers
description: A visual novel of magical realism, a GalGame of absurdism.

name: Idle Champions: Eonstaryx the Time Dragon Familiar Pack
description: Familiar packs contain an exclusive familiar, as well as a collection of potions that can help you progress further and faster! Familiars are NPCs that you can assign to certain tasks, such as leveling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates.

name: Aron's Adventure: Magic Reborn
description: A 3rd person action game! Save the world of Elor from ancient evil. Master archery, melee, and mystical abilities with the guidance of an ancient spirit. Fight enemies, solve puzzles, and craft gear. Choose your weapon, face epic bosses, and decide Elor's fate!

name: Elite Comet
description: Elite Comet is a collision-based fighting game that revolves around strategic clashes and precise collisions. Master the art of combat as every collision shapes the intensity of the battles, offering a uniquely dynamic and thrilling gaming experience.

name: A Chocolate World
description: This is 3d platformer an unusual adventure, come inside a world of chocolates and desserts where every move can be fatal 4 levels each one differs from the other.. No save point the goal is to finish every level with absolute precision it's challenging it' has zero calories.... press f4 to quit game

name: Machine Match
description: In our near future you'll build one-of-a-kind battle machines with custom designs and emerging personalities to fight on stunning dioramas against competing players in an instantly gratifying isometric combat game that is fun for newcomers and great for veterans.

name: Prophecy
description: A cozy, narrative-driven, first person horror based on the true events of the Mothman back in the 1960's.

name: Aspect Heroes
description: Turn-based tactical strategy game with a focus on huge hero and enemy selection. Fight infinite waves of greatly varying enemies while you earn rewards for each wave clear. Craft gear to succeed in the next round and make the hero specific leaderboards! Unlock more heroes and story perspectives!

name: Ostrich Farm
description: Sunshine graces the farm and your birds are a fashion disaster. Breed vibrant ostriches by matching colors and patterns to complete unique orders. Earn valuable rewards and mutation points to enhance your farm's genetic diversity.

name: Critter Crossfire
description: A genre-breaking fusion of Turn-Based Tactics and First Person Shooting made by a solo developer. Position your units in a detailed 3D environment and skillfully aim your shots with physics-based weapons. Collect and combine items to build unique loadouts from over 50 wacky weapons and upgrades.

name: Kingdom
description: Kingdom is a Single & Multiplayer RPG Survival game. Set in a medieval fantasy world, where you can become a king and set taxes or fight giants.

name: The Sireen
description: You are trying to prevent the spread of a top secret invention to the islands from an accidental Laboratory explosion on an island You are maybe the last people left on the island , Crafts, you build houses, you hunt. a new open world survival horror simulator

name: Report on the Death of Robert Evergreen
description: A retro audio-based narrative game about the power of the news. Robert Evergreen is dead! The public adored him, but what was he like in private? Listen to interviews with Robert’s friends and family, decide what kind of article you’d like your paper to print, and watch the story unfold.

name: Long Lost
description: You must unravel the secrets behind the death of your great grandmother, explore the past, discover what happened, and, above all, ensure that history does not repeat itself.

name: Boxing Legend
description: Welcome to Boxing Legend! Jump in an immersiv, real world based Simulation. Create and build up your character from a nobody to the undisputed champion of the world and further, if you got what it takes obviously...

name: Pizzdile
description: The Jungle is a dangerous and beautiful place. Can you survive alongside hordes of crocodiles, fighting for survival and the chance to eat delicious pizza? The meme about crocodiles and pizza is being taken to the next level.

name: Girl Gunner
description: Girl Gunner is a fun 2D shooter game with a rich weapon system, exquisite graphics, and beautiful BGM, especially bullets. Currently, there are up to 24 types! Players will play the cute girl Emily, escaping from the deserted island and breaking out of the siege.

name: Dread Protocol
description: Embark on a thrilling 3rd-person space adventure. Engage in merciless combat, wield a vast arsenal, and explore procedurally generated environments. Take down the Federation, one station at a time.

name: Atone
description: Des 101 - Jam 3 - Theme: Spirits - Group: Lucky 7

name: Desert Bus
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Girls: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Vegas Infinite
description: Sin descripción

name: FeastTower
description: Pon a prueba tu destreza en la creación del sándwich más monumental y asegura tu lugar en lo más alto de la puntuación. ¿Te atreves a asumir el desafío?

name: Tales From the Herd
description: Tales From the Herd is an upcoming life simulation game that takes place in an abandoned pony village; one that you and a friend take charge in the restoration of. It features rich character customization, adaptive dialogue, and a strong focus on atmosphere and story telling.

name: Warja
description: Warja is a roguelite tower defence game where you collect loot, upgrade towers, and level up your hero to defend against endless waves of monsters.

name: Treachery
description: Tear through demonic hoards and seize nightmarish bosses in a desperate quest to rescue your kidnapped son. Unleash hell in this unforgiving retro first-person shooter by wielding unique weapons, conquering challenging puzzles, and making the treacherous journey through the nine circles of HELL!

name: Indie Nights: Nightmare in Yellow Pine
description: The horrors that have risen out of the small town of Yellow Pine, Idaho have come to Indie Nights!

name: Homeless
description: Live the story of Nelson Santana, a man who returns to his homeland seeking his own past. Face your biggest fears in this journey of psychological horror set in the country side of Brazil.Survive the deafening silence...Welcome to Santa Cecília.

name: Weaponmancer
description: Weaponmancer is an action roguelite where you, a unique mage, summon weapons to fend off diverse foes. Navigate bullet-riddled challenges, adapt with every run, and harness fallen enemies' essence to evolve and conquer.

name: Abondoned Village
description: A first person horror game about an enthusiastic historian who found an old map of a hidden village... ignorant of the story of that village he decided to explore it, not knowing that there is a monster sealed in it, eventually releasing the monster that is trying to kill him.

name: Rise & Reign
description: Washed ashore on a strange medieval land, its up to you to choose your destiny. Harvest resources, craft weapons, and build your kingdom. Raid other players or work together. Serve the king or take the throne for yourself. This land is harsh, can you survive?

name: Blood Radiant
description: Blood Radiant is a lovecraftian soulslike action-RPG. Explore a mythical island at the intersection of many space-times while you find weapons, battle eldritch abominations, uncover secrets, and talk to NPCs in a dark quest to achieve ultimate power.

name: Dungeon Man
description: A bullet-hell dungeon game where you use colored gems to match the enemy in order to deal damage. Each enemy type has a unique attack style. Shoot and Dodge as you search for the evil toilet snake which lies deep within the dungeon.

name: Gold Knight
description: Start your Gold Knight adventure with 2.5D puzzles, Sokoban gameplay blended with exclusive challenges. Master the binary realm of Light and Darkness to forge powerful Gold Orbs. Survive the Darkness by using memory strategies and sound hints.

name: Dimensional Shift Awakening
description: This game is a soul born inspired action adventure RPG game. I want to make each character unique and flesh out their own story, background, personality then all of this will affect the character powers, type, talents, skills, fighting styles, and weapons.

name: League of Speedrunners
description: League of Speedrunners is a third-person 3D platformer. An exciting competition for the title of the best speedrunner awaits you, where many missions are scattered across the open world. Play as different heroes, each with unique superpowers. Avoid traps and enemies.

name: Catting Over It
description: Challenge your jumping skills and immerse yourself in the world of real jumping tactics. The stakes are high, remember, the higher you climb, the harder you fall, every mistake can teach you a valuable lesson, or not, but it will be fun!

name: DDS x Narcos
description: Spinoff of the hit game Drug Dealer Simulator and the legendary show Narcos. It’s the 1980s, you are a disgraced CIA agent turned drug dealer. You will run your business in Mexico and the US in this story-driven simulator about the life of crime.

name: Arena of Faith
description: Win,Team up,Get Rewards and become the eSports King in Arena of Faith.

name: Sonic 3 & Knuckles Battle Race
description: Sonic 3 & Knuckles Battle Race is a competitive 2-player romhack of Sonic 3 & Knuckles. A creative use of technical limitations, the players are put into Sonic 3 & Knuckles' stages- however, the camera only follows the player who's the furthest ahead. When the camera scrolls past the other player, the former wins a point and the latter respawns. It's heavily inspired by the older Sonic 2 Battle Race, bringing polish and additions to the game formula, and putting it in Sonic 3's more complex levels. Note: this game is 2-player only, and it is unrelated to Sonic 3 & Knuckles' "competition" mode, which features exclusive levels.

name: Buck Rogers: Planet of Zoom
description: Sin descripción

name: Buck Rogers: Planet of Zoom
description: Sin descripción

name: Buck Rogers: Planet of Zoom

name: Angel Hare's Learning Adventure

name: HeroSmash
description:
HeroSmash was a Flash MMORPG developed by Artix Entertainment, using a modified version of the AdventureQuest Worlds engine. HeroSmash had a distinct art style and world setting based on superheroes and supervillains, rather than Artix Entertainment's traditional fantasy settings. Instead of using classes with unique abilities, players could equip any combination of abilities to suit their play style.

HeroSmash's public Alpha testing began in December 2010 followed by a public beta launch in April 2011. The game failed to gain traction outside of the company's core fans; paid subscriptions were removed in 2014, updates were discontinued in 2015, and the game never left its beta phase. HeroSmash was officially shut down in 2020 when browser support for Flash Player ended; players were able to access the game through alternate means for a time until the servers were completely removed.

The release date was projected as early 2008 with a retail price of approximately $40. However, Vendel announced in 2010 that the project was not going to be released by Atari and no further information was released.

To master our real time deckbuilding roguelike you will not only learn how to avoid your enemies attacks but also how to play your cards most efficiently.

The Traitor Curse Part 1 - Features:

New Cinematic: Learn about the motivations of the Moebian 6th and discover The Carnival, a new disreputable zone promising transgressive distractions and entertainment.
New Zone & Mission: Strike at the heart of the Moebian 6th operations and fend off hordes of enemies in Mercantile located in The Carnival.
Inspect Feature: Inspect player loadouts in The Mourningstar.
Update to Veteran Talent Tree: Enjoy many changes and tweaks made to the Veteran tree, including the addition of Keystones (due to these changes, Veterans will see their talent tree reset and players will have to re-assign talent points).

name: Vending Mayhem

Imagine a world where a single penny stands against the tyranny of sugary drinks and aluminum cans. You play as our brave, pocket-sized protagonist who's tired of being jingled around in wallets, purses, and the depths of forgotten drawers. This penny is no ordinary currency; it's a fighter, and it's ready to punch its way out of a sticky situation.

The setting is within the confines of a vending machine, where rows of tantalizing canned beverages line the shelves, tempting the thirst of unsuspecting customers. Our hero despises these soda and cola cans and is determined to escape the mechanical prison. But it won't be easy – the path to freedom is filled with challenging obstacles and formidable foes.

Vending Mayhem is a humble, amateur creation that promises a simple and entertaining gaming experience. Will you conquer the vending machine's mayhem and find your way to freedom in this pixelated world?
