description: In this Lovecraftian real-time tactics game you play as a 1920s cult leader on a mission from the Old Ones. Build your cult, summon eldritch monsters, and undertake stealth tactics missions to spread insanity and amass power! In CTHULHU KEEPER you are the cosmic horror.

name: Prodeus: The Elder Veil
description: The Elder Veil is a DLC expansion to the retro first-person shooter action game Prodeus. Explore a new Greek-inspired environment with plenty of enemies to dispatch and weapons to use while airborne thanks to a trusty deployable chain for traversal.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - The Remains
description: The Remains is a soon to be releasing mod for Steel Wool Studios' Five Nights at Freddy's Security Breach. This mod restores every single scrapped mission, model, map, minigame, ETC. Back into full functioning order!

name: Call of Duty Tactics
description: Call of Duty Tactics was a strategy game being developed by Vicarious Visions.

name: Maigo no Koneko-chan
description: Sin descripción

name: Motto Shiritai Kodai Egypt
description: Sin descripción

name: Uchi Training
description: Sin descripción

name: Oshi to Hanaseru! Hangul Kiso Phrase
description: Sin descripción

name: Oku dake Drill Shougaku 6-nensei Kanji
description: Sin descripción

name: Monishiri Quiz Taiko no Kyouryuu
description: Sin descripción

name: Kuru-kuru Puzzle Sekai-shi B
description: Sin descripción

name: Irochi Mikke!
description: Sin descripción

name: Merge Games Japan Best
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives+: Saiko Mystery Series Vol.5 - Cold Rain
description: Sin descripción

name: Brain Memory: Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cuckoo Climb
description: You play as a Cuckoo Clock piece that has fallen to the bottom of a Cuckoo Clock. You have to make it back to the top of the top of the clock in time before the hour strikes to be back in position!

name: Zero Tolerance Origins
description:
Zero Tolerance Origins on retro cartridges will come with the original game Zero Tolerance and the never released sequel Zero Tolerance Underground, which starts right where the first part ends!

Zero Tolerance was one of the earliest first-person titles ever released on Sega Mega Drive and Genesis and is set in a futuristic world where the universe is swarmed by all possible kinds of evil aliens. As highly skilled member of the Zero Tolerance team, you get called to repel the aliens’ invasion and protect mankind from the enemy.
Fight back the aliens’ attack on the spaceship Europe-1 and repel their invasion on earth in Zero Tolerance and hunt down the invaders on a subway mission in the never before released sequel Zero Tolerance Underground!

name: Netflix Stories: Virgin River
description: Netflix Stories: Virgin River is a interactive narrative game that was announced in August 2023 along with Netflix Stories: Love is Blind and Netflix Stories: Money Heist from the developer Boss Fight Entertainment exclusively for the Netflix Games service.

name: Grove
description:
"Grove” is an M/M focused NSFW RPG following the journey of an adventurer as he attempts to venture into the far north of an unexplored land. You play as Grove, a skilled dragon explorer and cartographer assisting in the main island colonisation.

As parties disperse, individuals begin to disappear further towards the cusp of the north. Soon, rumours of curses and monstrous entities encroaching from the northern expanse begin to spread among your ranks. As you near the end of your allocated survey areas, you are given a strange contraption with a marked map, the only guide to its function.

Your interest piqued, you set off and begin your journey into the northern expanse.

name: Food Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Procyon and Deneb
description:
A ROM hack of Pokémon FireRed and a sequel to Pokémon Vega. It aims to be a completely original fan-made Pokémon experience, featuring the brand new region of Setoguni, over 100 new Pokémon including new evolutions of official Pokémon, new moves and mechanics, and a new storyline.

Its most recent beta was released on April 1st, 2018, and the project has been in indefinite hiatus ever since.

name: Super MiniJolt
description:
This is Super MiniJolt! Not a military program!
We aim to make a game full of minigames and you are more than welcomed to join!
We don’t need professionals, we need people with creativity!

name: Chicken Run: Eggstraction
description: Sin descripción

name: The Dragon Prince: Xadia
description: Explore Xadia, team up with friends, and battle evil forces in this hack & slash looter ARPG.

name: Razerwire: Nanowars - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tama & Friends: 3-match Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Paradise: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosplay Relaxation
description: Sin descripción

name: Tyalband
description: Enter the mountain of glass, Oronmaril! An incomplete traditional roguelike for the Playdate.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Reserve Pass
description: Expand your fishing journey with the Reserve Pass!

name: Cooking Trip: New Challenge - Collector's Edition
description: Cooking trip is an exciting game about dishes and restaurant business!

name: Chicken vs. Eggs
description:
Aim and shoot game with an angry rooster in the main role.

Play the role of an angry bodybuilding rooster and collect all yolks from the super eggs to become an arm wrestling champion.

name: Electron Zaraftor
description: Sam is an artificial intelligence drone, programmed by Rebecca, designed and built by the US army. Connected to the army database, Sam start asking questions from the archive. And accessed the wrong file.

name: Expedition: Crushing Depth
description:
Expedition: Crushing Depth is an atmospheric submarine horror game.
Maintain and operate your submarine in order to reach the deepest point in the ocean, but watch out for dangers!

name: Fortnite: Infinite Drift Pack
description: Combat is the name of the game for this team. Prepare your tactics with the Infinite Drift pack. Includes 3 Outfits, 3 Back Blings and 3 Pickaxes.

name: Kugle
description: Play with your friends in a galaxy in which you collect, breed and trade Kugles.

name: Patrolling Mars
description: Drive over the rough Mars terrain, jump over holes and other obstacles, fire at attacking alien space craft and other dangers. Clear each stage and try to get the highest score. A good pallet cleanser with good old arcade fun.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 02
description: Drift in style with RIDE 5 - Free Pack 02!

name: Suv 4x4 Car Parking Simulator
description: Perform realistic parking tasks with SUV vehicle, win prizes, customize your vehicle, and experience the excitement! Enjoy the game and go on an adventure!

name: Syncromania
description: Syncromania is a modern side-scrolling hyper-action shoot-em-up game with platformer elements.

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms Season Pass
description: Embark on countless new adventures and set yourself up for the long term with the Vagrus Season Pass. With it, you can partake in Vagrus's massive expansion, as well as survive and thrive in numerous new, exciting locations across the Riven Realms and beyond.

name: BoltBreak 2
description: Become the ultimate superhero in the first-ever open-world speedster game.

name: Resonance
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Resonance. Play interactive storylines to learn English in an inuitive style.

name: Strike Solitaire
description:
Solitaire or bowling? Two in one!
Complete 120 levels in Strike Solitaire in the unique setting of bowling hotels.

name: Leaf Blower Sim
description: Dive into leafy tranquility in Leaf Blower Paradise, a solo adventure where you wield a powerful blower to transform messy landscapes into clean havens. Upgrade your gear, enjoy the serene atmosphere, and sculpt your outdoor sanctum. It's a relaxing escape to blow away stress, one leaf at a time.

name: Kaisho
description: A Third person fantasy RPG in a fantasy medieval world, sword, katana, axe fighting system where you are a little girl named Hana in the kingdom of Kaisho. Fight against creatures and spiders to free Kaisho from the evil. Step into a fantasy adventure and start your journey. Welcome to Kaisho

name: Cassiel
description: Cassiel is a casual roguelite game where you fight against hordes of creatures. Combine unique items and weapons to become the strongest on a satisfying and wave based gameplay

name: Garmm Adventurer Vol.1
description: You play as a young man who lives in a faraway village full of elders and move out to become an adventurer in a bigger city to find some young women to have sex with. VN element with turn-base fighting and animated sex scenes.

name: Battlecade
description: Welcome to Battlecade, A fast-paced frantic arena shooter pitting you and another opponent against eachother to see who comes out on top.

name: Error_Boy.exe
description: The games have mixed up due to an error! Defeat the enemies by using items from various games! 1000101 1101110 1101010 1101111 1111001 100001

name: Dagger Run: Aerocombatic Racing
description: Dagger Run: Aerocombatic Racing is a Sci-Fi immersive-sim and racing hybrid. Race futuristic jet racecraft through tracks across multiple planets. Step out of the cockpit to explore the racing world, find, purchase, tweak and modify new parts and ships.

name: Brawlygon
description: A stylized, low poly fighting game, with various warriors from various eras and worlds! Simple controls make it easy to learn, with plenty of tools to play around with for those who want more depth! Also introducing “Piercing” attacks, to shake up the genre, by dealing higher damage on blocking opponents compared landing a clean hit!

name: Archive 1985
description: Charlie and his childhood friend Jack go on a boat trip that turns into a nightmare. Trapped in a storm...Charlie washes up on an abandoned fishing island...

name: Factories of Golden Waters
description: Factories of Golden Waters is a strategy game where you manage a shipping empire. Build docks, deliver materials, and produce gold from water. Optimize your supply chain and thrive in a barren land.

name: In Style
description: Immerse yourself in a relentless third-person shooter set in a dystopian cyberpunk world.

name: Circle of Swords
description: Circle of Swords is a party-based retro RPG by a solo developer. Gather your party, conquer deadly foes, discover powerful artifacts, and survive to tell the tale! Inspired by classics like Baldur's Gate and Neverwinter Nights.

name: Knight in the Maze
description: This is a story-driven Roguelike game. Four knights, while investigating anomalies within the labyrinth, accidentally became trapped inside a sealed maze. They need to work together to navigate the labyrinth, discover the cause of the anomalies, and simultaneously find a way to escape.

name: 6N23
description: 6n23 is a action-platfomer-racing game. Rush fast as you can. Use your finger, find path. It has controls similar to a fighting game, allowing you to practice your control skills.

name: Hypnofantasis
description: Hypnofantasis is a game in the genre of classic Run'N'Gun games, in a mysterious aesthetic similar to the dream world. The protagonist is a masked gentleman who kills demons with saber blows and a barrage of bullets and projectiles.

name: Monica's Paradox
description: Monica's Paradox is a narrative driven puzzle platformer. Play as Monica, a downtrodden QA tester who gets sucked into her company's big new release, navigating bugs with the aid of your sometimes helpful, often hostile workmates, all the while coping with office gossip and romance.

name: Chinese Culinary Shop
description: Chinese Culinary Shop "is a traditional Chinese food simulation cooking game. In the game, players can play the role of a talented Chinese food chef, experiencing the production process of traditional Chinese cuisine firsthand, gradually transforming your small inn into a renowned food paradise.

name: Hume Index
description: As a special agent who specializes in dealing with unstable reality, you need to use your firearms, blades, and elemental reactions to eliminate mutants in an abandoned cosmo, control the source, and escape if possible. Can be played as a single player or with 2-4 players in Co-Op mode.

name: Deathrun
description: Deathrun is an electrifying online multiplayer sprint where speed, strategy, and survival go hand-in-hand. Team up or go solo in a race through a treacherous obstacle course where every player is for themselves. Dodge traps, outpace the competition, and don’t trust anyone.

name: Mighty Mini Golf
description: Mighty Mini Golf is a wild mini golf adventure! Golf through crazy hazards using wild items in both single and local multiplayer modes. Fight and block hazards with swings of your club, fight dangerous bosses in single player mode, and explore map screens and unlock new characters and courses!

name: Forgery Craft
description: Master the art of forgery in this story-driven simulation game. Start with altering documents by changing single signatures and dates. End up forging entire art pieces that could fool any museum expert.

name: Dinosaur World
description: Dinosaur World is a survival game about dinosaurs. You can tame and hunt dinosaurs, ride them, grow crops, craft a variety of weapons, build houses and furniture.

name: All About The High Score
description: All About The High Score is all about the high score. That's it! You chase high scores. You try to get a number up. Numbers must go up.

name: Kill The Shadow
description: Kill The Shadows is a suspenseful plot-oriented mystery-solving investigation game. It uses a time loop as the background of the story. It has many characters and branches, and high-definition 3D scenes and 2D pixel characters create a highly contrasting and unique visual effect. Art style.

name: Fairune: Fragment Isles
description: Where did all the fairies go? Fairune: Fragment Isles is an action-adventure game where you follow Liana through her journey solving mysteries and puzzles from island to island.

name: Kosmos: The Discovery of Nature
description: Kosmos is a first-person exploration adventure in which you set sail on the vast ocean to discover the wilderness of nature. Make use of the natural resources of the tropical jungle and meet a variety of wildlife on your journey of taking photographs of the wonders of the world.

name: Qwess
description: Qwess is a online MMO survival game set in a Alien like world with a unique game style and design, take control of various creatures and roam around the world, fight and survive among other players and truly make your story unique as you traverse the alien landscape through out your adventure

name: Plowing
description: Plowing is a point and click simulation game, where you have to subdue the whole town in 13 days to establish order. Shoot. Imprison. Pardon. Hear the visitors out. Keep track of time. But most importantly — keep calm…

name: Pizza Delivery: Zebaxx
description: You are a young Spanish woman who has just moved to the outskirts of Venice, and has just found a job in a newly opened pizzeria...

name: PathoBlasta VS
description: The EXUOA Virus was found in a remote location in central USA by professor Zed. He founded BLASTA Corp. and put together an elite Unit of Bio Soldiers to deal with areas of infestation. You as a member of Blasta must protect the containment and quarantine areas and not allow the virus through.

name: Paranormal Capture Investigation
description: Become a paranormal investigator in Paranormal Capture Investigation! Play with your friends and discover the world of the paranormal. The game is developed on Unreal Engine 5 with the latest technology.

name: Our Life on Water
description: Start your new life as Rivertalker in this magical life-sim RPG. Befriend spirits of the Mekong River to build and protect your floating village. Drift, farm, fish, forge friendships, fall in love. Shape the tale of a world worth saving.

name: OnCall
description: On Call is a visual novel that takes you through a 3-day rotation at Merritt General Hospital. Build trust with your patients and their families to get them on the road to recovery. Manage your own stress while confronting these challenges or you may just crack under the pressure.

name: Obscurum
description: Are you afraid of the sea and other waters? Overcome your fear of the dark and deep water in this simulator. No one will stand by your side on the open sea. Go into the water and try to survive.

name: Rhythm League Heroes
description: Join the musical heroes and enjoy an adventure filled with humor and music! Follow a group of charismatic characters to face diverse enemies through musical battles. Manage your team to advance in the story and discover the different corners of the mysterious Sky Island.

name: Robots at Midnight
description: Robots at Midnight will have you embracing intense combat, unravelling deep lore, and discovering what it means to be human. In this Action RPG, explore the world of Yob as Zoe, a scrappy hero searching for her past and protecting her future.

name: Serve The Cups
description: Make the coffees and serve the cups. Get ready for a chaotic, couch-party experience in Serve The Cups! with mini-games designed for up to four players, you'll brew and serve your way to success. It's the perfect game for coffee lovers and gamers alike!

name: Spooky Spins Returns: Crazy Cash Edition - Slots
description: Spooky Spins Returns : Crazy Cash Edition is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Horror theme oriented from left to right. - with the similar lightning strike feature.

name: Sovereign Reign
description: Gifted with divine will, establish your Deity's kingdom on Earth. Recruit believers, erect essential structures and vanquish barbarian threats to shape your realms destiny and Reign as Sovereign.

name: SOS Zombie: Survival
description: SOS Zombie follows the harrowing journey of a group of diverse survivors trapped in a city overrun by a zombie apocalypse. Seeking refuge in an abandoned house, the group fights waves of increasingly aggressive zombies while preparing for a rescue helicopter scheduled for evacuation a rescue point.

name: Strexy Slayers
description: Create your hero and enter into battle either alone or with friends in a dynamic action slasher with elements of roguelike and base building.

name: Suika Dish More Plates
description: More plates, more points. More fruits, more points.

name: Tales of Moriviha: Deadly Secret
description: A survival horror first person RPG with branching storylines and rich lore, where your dialogue choices can come back to haunt you. Use your wits to survive, put your sneaking skills to the test, and when all else fails, it's up to you to decide if your resources are worth the fight or not.

name: The Backrooms: You've Been Here Before
description: You find yourself in Backrooms, and it's up to you to find a way out of this place. You are completely lost, in a world of endless corridors and liminal spaces. And no one knows what's waiting for you around the next corner.

name: Teacher Seduction
description: Math is such a boring thing... Unless you have a hot teacher! In this case, even her angry boyfriend might not be a big problem.

name: Synthetic Soul
description: Synthetic Soul is an immersive modern Rags to Riches life sim with an in-depth robot companion. What kind of person will you become once you truly have it all? Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.

name: Watson
description: Watson is a two-player co-op horror adventure game. The two cute little robots must escape from the evil beings chasing them. Explore a grand and beautiful Victorian city with a steampunk makeover. Uncover secrets about the city, the robots, and the beings chasing them. But don't get caught!

name: TunsTan
description: A cartoon style side-scroller action/strategy RPG. Raise a warband of tumbleweeds to lead into battle and command and fight alongside them. Explore the world, craft items, and lead your warband to the adventure!

name: To The Tavern
description: Send Patrons out to quests. Use the class and element triangles to deal critical damage! Serve ale to give your patrons to give them buffs and equip them with the best weapons. Don't let your patrons die or your business will close.

name: Titan Station: VR
description: Experience Titan Station in VR.

name: The Source
description: The Source is a unique modern take on the Text Adventure genre. An outsider to a foreign world, you must choose a kingdom to help gain an ancient power locked deep beneath a mysterious Well. Explore each kingdom, solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery surrounding this shattered world.

name: Zombie Night
description: Zombie Night is a twin-stick shooter where you explore various locations to gather resources and build up your base to defend the night against the zombie horde.

name: Winter of the Arbyen
description: 'Winter of the Arbyen' is a game that combines adventure and store manage simulation. In the world where the Ice Age has come, you must survive as a shopkeeper in a coal mine village. Find the missing father, chase the 'Firestone'. Various characters are waiting to help you or take advantage of you.

name: Resident Evil RPG
description:
Resident Evil RPG is a fangame based on the original Resident Evil (the one released for PlayStation, Saturn and PC), which also includes certain elements from Resident Evil Rebirth (Gamecube).

Resident Evil RPG was developed in RPG Maker XP by Evilbiel and co-produced by Dungeon Master and follows the story of a police team, S.T.A.R.S, who go to investigate a sinister mansion where there have been macabre reports of murders.

The game has extra unlockable modes with new adventures (some fake), with a storyline behind the main one! The project came from the idea of playing Resident Evil from a new perspective, in 2D, but far surpassing Resident Evil Gaiden, from the Game Boy Color!

name: The Backrooms Exploration
description: You were an employer of M.E.G and you were assigned to go on an adventure into the Backrooms, but something went wrong and you were completely lost. Deep into a various liminal spaces with a realistics graphics created with Unreal Engine 5

name: Do Us Part
description:
Do Us Part is a short puzzle adventure game where the player controls the newlywed Margerita in exploring the estate of her new, somehow very rich, husband. Of course, a normal, peaceful marriage would not make an exciting fairy tale or game, so things do not go as expected. People might've gone missing in this mansion before. Spooky things might happen. Someone might die. Who knows! Margerita doesn't, otherwise surely she wouldn't be in this position in the first place.

The game is loosely based upon How the Devil Married Three Sisters, with an emphasis on loosely.

name: Slashes
description: Just a casual talk between a girl and a knife.

name: Polarvoid
description: It's nighttime and you are home alone during a rainstorm. You get bored and decide to organize your family's photo album. There are 9 polaroids missing, you go look for them. Though you feel like someone is watching you from outside the house...

name: Gam3rAbduction
description: A Game Made by Gam3rBoy57. Its about a Controller which gets chased by UFOs that try to abduct it.

name: Excuse Me Sir
description:
Excuse Me Sir is a point-and-click adventure game featuring content creator Molly Moon. Her world is creepy, surreal, and if you're not careful... deadly! Can you solve the mystery of your missing brother? Or will Molly lure you to your doom?

"This game only has one rule: I Always Win."

Excuse Me Sir is an unholy collaboration between Molly, Airdorf Games, Jesse Cox (Scary Game Squad, Monster Prom) and Torple Dook (Chip's Tips, Hand of Doom). ALSO featuring original artwork by Siren Head creator Trevor Henderson!

name: Merc Storia: Ijutsushi to Kane no Neiro
description: Sin descripción

name: 1 Penguin 100 Cases
description: After being caught in a fishing net, Pengoo is taken to New Zealand. Journey with him as he struggles to find his way back home. Surprises are in store as Pengoo befriends a colorful cast of characters and mystical creatures, each with their own predicaments. Can you help solve their problems as well as Pengoo's? 1 Penguin 100 Cases features 90 levels of classical I-spy adventure with original puzzles and mini-games for everyone!

name: Grav1ty
description: Discover an enigmatic universe. Explore diverse biomes, face ancient guardians, and uncover hidden secrets in this captivating 2D pixel art platformer. Embark on an unforgettable cosmic odyssey!

name: Project TB
description: Project TB, a 4v4 & 5v5 team battle action game based on a future where Earth becomes a relic of its past. With a top-view style, conquer your foes and control with acceleration and deceleration mechanics. Too late to stop. Experience speedy battles in a wide array of environments of this universe.

name: Estate Empire
description: Estate Empire is a multiplayer strategic game inspired by classic board games. Compete against your friends and develop your own strategy to win, and try to dismantle your friend's empire. Invest in the same street as your friends, use your cards or become the mayor to create new laws against them.

name: Danny's Descent
description: Pedal through the looping halls to find Room 237 - Hand tracking VR horror game

name: RunBunRunBun
description: RunBunRunBun is an Action Survival Rougelite Bullet Hell. Face off bosses and swarms of computer viruses using a vast arsenal of weapons and abilities. Select upgrades to create a build that can wipe out enemies in an instant.

name: Towerbloom
description: Embark on a quirky roguelite tower defense odyssey where your cursor is the true hero. Hover over towers to supercharge their capabilities, unlock upgrades, channel powerful abilities, and gather resources to amplify your destructive prowess.

name: Chrono Bullet
description: Co-op bullet hell. Chrono Bullet is unique game with a choice of character class. A beautiful and colourful picture in an atmospheric world. Help the heroes to save their world by defeating unusual bosses.

name: Timeshift Detective
description: Don the trenchcoat of private eye Harrison Steel and dive deep into a futuristic crime-noir story sprawling with clues to track down. Crime and corruption run rampant in the city and above all looms the mysterious phenomenon known as "Timeshifts". Can you rise to the challenge and crack the case?

name: Crisis Survivors
description: A casual game of meat pigeons Dealing different damage to enemies through different skill combinations.

name: Legend of Egypt: Jewels of the Gods
description: Thabit mercilessly rules his kingdom in the land of Egypt, until one day he is struck by a heavy blow of fate. The gods Isis and Osiris take pity on the young pharaoh: by building a magnificent city that offers shelter to many contented inhabitants, Thabit can change his fate.

name: Sir Bob: Squire for Hire
description: In the legends of King Arthur... nobles, soldiers, and the Lady of the Lake all say you're too wimpy to become a Knight. Prove them wrong!

name: Statera: Aurum
description: In a time of peace and prosperity, life thrived on the island of Miralis and the port city of the same name. The island, known for its flourishing gold veins and fertile soil, gained fame through trade and the eager gold seekers who flocked to the mines to find their fortune.

name: Mages Arena
description: Mages Arena is a mix of Pinball, Foosball and Air Hockey with a bit of strategy in the middle.

name: Baphomet
description: Baphomet is an Action RPG that immerses you in sumptuous settings. As a knight, you are sent by the King to face an evil threat. With a sword and some magic powers, face your enemies and deliver the world from the the evil that is spreading.

name: Kryh Explorer
description: Explore the world of the crystal-mining creatures, the Kryh, Meet other alien races, improve your equipments and customize your burrow. Great adventures are waiting in Kryh Explorer!

name: S. Cargo
description: A short adventure game, S. Cargo is about a little postsnail on her quest to find the disappearing belongings of the islanders. You'll meet several colorful other creatures and find a few secret around as you explore and solve a few puzzles. It can be found for download on the official website by Smidgen, as well as an open source version on GitHub.

name: LBreakout2
description: The successor to LBreakout offers you a new challenge in more than 50 levels with loads of new bonuses (goldshower, joker, explosive balls, bonus magnet ...), maluses (chaos, darkness, weak balls, malus magnet ...) and special bricks (growing bricks, explosive bricks, regenerative bricks ...). If you are hungry for more you can create your own levelsets with the integrated level editor. There is also an experimental two player mode (via LAN) available.

name: Outbreak: Co-Op Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Alchemy: Autobattler
description: Forge your own weapon and master alchemy, Battle other players to see who is the best!

name: Bravest Chicken
description: Minimalist precision platformer starring a cute chicken. Flap your wings, avoid obstacles, get to the top of the tower and become Bravest Chicken!

name: BvB: Burglars vs. Brats
description: Burglars vs Brats is a team-based online multiplayer game where players compete as both The Burglars and The Brats in a game of Attack and Defend. Inspired by classic films such as Home Alone, The Goonies, Kevin the Menace, and more! BvB is full of laugh-out-loud moments and charismatic characters!

name: Cloud Castle
description: 《Cloud Castle》It is a strategic tower defense game that builds your defense route by placing and upgrading on a grid map, resisting waves of monsters.

name: Cosmic Blastards
description: Battle time and terror in this shoot & survive action roguelite. Select your hero and survive the relentless cosmic surge. Shoot, level up, topple bosses, and amplify your powers to cosmic levels. Embrace the Blastard within and unlock new heroes, powers, and perks to use on future runs.

name: Dreamworld Dread
description: Your nightmares relentlessly return every time you close your eyes. Learn new skills, level them up, and never lose them, or else succumb to the darkness in this thrilling roguelite deckbuilder.

name: End of Back World
description: End of Back World is a Bishojo TPS action game based on the SCP worldview. You must kill mutants in the backroom and cleanse the city. Survive through combat training and weapon modification with items obtained from the back room.

name: First Blood
description: "First Blood" bağımsız bir optimizayon mekanizması kullanır. Oyunda, Klasik Mücadele, Eğleneli Mücadele ve Macera modları vardır. Harika silahlar, sürükleyici atış deneyimi ve heyecan verici savaşlar, oyuncuların silahlarla savaşma eğlencesinin tadını çıkarması için tasarlandı.

name: Forged Isles
description: "Forged Isles" offers a breathtaking 3D medieval experience in the sky. Mine resources, conquer dungeons, and shape your own tale amidst floating islands. Unleash your inner adventurer and defy gravity today!

name: Isopod: A Webbed Spin-off
description: You're a tiny pill-bug in a big world! From the creators of Webbed. Roll, zip, and slam your way through the gorgeous landscapes of the Australian bush, unite your fellow bugs, and fight back the greedy Fire Ant Conglomerate!

name: Hearth & Holmes
description: A mystery-solving life sim where John Watson tries to get his flatmate to eat something and go to sleep.

name: Hangry Bear
description: Bear your hunger and prepare for a paw-some time! Hangry Bear's arcade adventure lets you dash, flip, and dropkick your way through a hilarious frenzy. Can you keep your cool while your bear belly rumbles, racing against the clock to satisfy your fishy desires and secure bear-brilliant high scores?

name: Ground Parkour: First Mission
description: Ground parkour: First Mission, in short, you compete with yourself to reach the highest point on the track with different characters and different abilities in a construction site in the city. Each character has different abilities and you progress on this track full of obstacles. Enjoy!

name: Motionrec
description:
Motionrec is an action game that progresses through stages by recording and replaying the trajectory of your movements. Using Motionrec, you aim to clear stages quickly by recording and replaying your unique motions.

Motionrec is a gear that allows you to record, replay, and reverse-play your own movements. Customize it to your original specifications and strive for the fastest performance.

name: Lost Infinity
description: Where are you going with the main character? "Lost Infinity" is a game about nothing, or maybe something, only you will decide. Grieve, think, reason.

name: Mecha Nun-chuck Redeemer
description: Wield this Mighty Holy Weapon to Smite waves of mecha-demons ! Fill the Special Attack Gauge to launch a Devastating Holy Hand Grenade Attack! This Awesome Divine Power is Yours for a small donation of course.

name: Melody
description: Melody is a music themed game where you play a session musician, tasked with the job of teaching an aspiring singer-songwriter (named Melody). This VN is filled with plenty of drama, humour, romance, sex, and of course, music! Can you help Melody to share her songs and unique voice with the world?

name: Riders of the Wild
description: An open-world indoor biking game

name: Symbio
description: Immerse yourself in a microscopic world teeming with life and multitudes of organisms and species trying to survive in the harsh environment of prehistoric Earth. Eat, breed and poop (yes, that too). And evolve from a single cell to a complex multicellular organism.

name: The Crevice
description: Explore, adapt, and survive. Climb deep inside The Crevice and unearth the mysteries, horrors and treasures buried within in this subterranean roguelite survival adventure.

name: The Last World
description: After the world ends, the remaining survivors must defend the last spark of human civilization. Use the camp as a position to repel the waves of monsters in each city! Thay are too powerful? It doesn't matter! Get stronger equipment, learn stronger skills, and finally sweep thousands of armies!

name: Doomsday Lonely town
description: 《Doomsday Lonely town》is an idle tower defense game. In the doomsday world, you can form your team to resist the attacks of monsters and protect the isolated town behind you.

name: Mostly Harmless
description: Assume the role of Nanashi, who winds up journeying to the Core of a forsaken Earth with Cotard, its humorous and totally legitimate Janitor. Talk about architecture! Snoop emails with nuclear information! Prevent emotional crises!

name: Hollywood Animal
description: Make your dreams come true — or crush someone else’s. Take the helm of a major Hollywood studio at the dawn of sound cinema, and guide it through decades of creative achievements and glamor, debauchery and dark deeds, tough choices and unpleasant compromises.

name: KGoldrunner
description: KGoldrunner is an action game where the hero runs through a maze, climbs stairs, dig holes and dodges enemies in order to collect all the gold nuggets and escape to the next level. Your enemies are also after the gold. Worse still, they are after you!.

name: Auction
description: Auction is a game bundled into the Speller 6-in-1 Spellchecker. The game has you guess the item that is on sale, every wrong guess you lose money and you gain money by guessing it right. The handheld features 2 variations of the game, 1 against a computer and the other being local multiplayer.

name: Anagram
description: Anagram is a puzzle game that is bundled into the Speller 6-in-1 Spellchecker. The handheld features 2 versions of the game, one against a CPU and the other with local multiplayer.

name: Hangman
description: Hangman is a playable version of hangman that is bundled into the Speller 6-in-1 Spellchecker. The handheld features 2 versions of the game, one against a CPU and the other with local multiplayer.

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite EC-1500 Twin 1.5m
description: The E-flite EC-1500 Twin is a groundbreaking aircraft that offers a unique flight experience for a wide range of pilots! This multi-motor model carries echoes of full-scale civil and military cargo transport aircraft but has an incredible range of capabilities and options no other airplane matches.

name: Cyberdelic
description: Cyberdelic is an immersive FPS - Use a combination of weaponry to pierce your hostiles shields, armour and flesh. Swap out cybernetic components to best suit your combat encounters. Explore an interconnected environment acquiring additional tools to your arsenal.

name: 100F Blessing of the Guardian
description: “Climb 100 floors and save humans oppressed by evil spirits!” Experience a realistic VR game!

name: Armored Tussle
description: Armored Tussle is a roguelike twin-stick shooter where you control the elite tomcat battle tank pilots through a series of procedurally generated missions behind enemy lines, completing objectives, collecting upgrades and defeating any enemies that stand in your way.

name: Dungeons Deep
description: Plunge into the Dungeons Deep! A dark-fantasy ARPG featuring vast underworlds full of horrifying monsters and ancient treasures. Liberate the old lands of Antioch for those who still remain.

name: Crystal Corruption: Reclamation
description: Dive into a fast-paced, stylish action roguelike metroidvania as resurrected King Cedric. Hack and slash through diverse biomes, face corrupted minibosses, and conquer epic foes. Uncover shattered truths and choose your path to redemption in this gripping tale of vengeance and power.

name: Elves vs. Goblins Mahjongg World
description: Darkness descends upon the land of elves and goblins. Black clouds of smoke rise from the deep fiery maw of the volcano at Sparkle Mountain. They spread and with them gloom and cruel curses ...

name: False Hero
description: False Hero is a fast-paced soulslike adventure with a unique ability system, imaginative setting, and gripping soundtrack. All lands have fallen to Death and been corrupted beyond repair. Let them live on or destroy them once and for all.

name: Gin: The Silver Wind
description: Gin - The Silver Wind is a 2D Retro inspired video game that features its own take on classic controls seen in games from the late 80s and early 90s. Take control of Gin and plan your jumps with precision as you wind through stages filled with tight platforming sections and deadly hazards!

name: Hues of the Void
description: A dark, eldritch defense game, involving color matching and minion management! Can YOU stave off the Chromacrusade?

name: Indomitable Blade
description: Indomitable Blade is a classic turn-based Strategy RPG where you command the knights of the fallen kingdom. It tells a human drama of people stripped of their myths and pride, yet struggling fiercely to live on. Gather allies, make decisions, and harness strategy to challenge a brutal destiny.

name: Pteranodon 2: Primal Island
description: Get ready for an epic journey back in time with Pteranodon 2: Primal Island! In this thrilling sequel, the spear throwing action continues with an all-new story mode that takes you on a wild ride through prehistoric landscapes filled with danger and wonder!

name: SpaceFront
description: SpaceFront is a dynamic roguelike real-time strategy. Control Corgis and defend the galaxy from soviet invasion! No campaign will be the same thanks to procedurally generated maps, random artifacts, different units and abilities! Join the effort, join the SpaceFront!

name: Subzero Tides
description: Subzero Tides is a sci-fi colony builder set on Europa moon. Build a self-sustaining colony, harness geothermal vents for power and manage colonists. Experience a compelling blend of exploration, survival, and strategic decision-making.

name: Stomping Grounds
description: Enter the Stomping Grounds! A silly multiplayer party brawler where your body is your only weapon. Gain victory by hurling yourself at your enemies and laying waste to the level one ground-pound at a time. But watch your step! With fully destructible levels, no two stages are ever the same.

name: Steel Flood
description: Explore a fallen utopia in this action-packed adventure platformer. Harness the weather to find new paths. Fight the untamed machines and seek ways to get their fragile parts for crafting. Become the savior of humanity or its doom.

name: Sex in Space
description: Sex in Space is an enthralling adult visual novel adventure, placing you in Captain Nikolai Kovak's shoes, responsible for the spaceship. Your choices will shape the destiny of the crew as they contend with a perplexing temporal conundrum.

name: Rhythm Producer
description: Rhythm Producer is a rhythm game where players take on the role of a game producer and use four different rhythm game mechanics to complete a series of levels in art, programming, debugging, and review and release. Ultimately, they create a game within the game.

name: Rodent Retribution
description: Take on the role of a battle-hardened feline on a mission to eliminate a ruthless rat infestation in the underground world. Armed with powerful weaponry and cat-like agility, embark on a relentless journey through breathtaking subterranean environments in your quest for vengeance.

name: Rogue Tides
description: Set sail on a dangerous adventure! Crush unrelenting waves of enemies and build your ship! Challenge hard bosses, each with their own unique challenges! Can you stand the tides? Will you sink or swim?

name: Sword n' Dragons
description: fantasy boss fight, arcade dynamic gameplay, roguelite vibes. breathtaking action in some epic combat against giant monsters all over the way !!

name: The Darkened Halls
description: Prepare to face nightmarish bosses in 'The Darkened Halls.' Armed with intellect, not weapons, you are a vulnerable young protagonist hunted by demons. Solve puzzles, secure key items, and challenge powerful foes in a relentless pursuit.

name: The Detective
description: Step into the shoes of an experienced detective and uncover dark secrets while solving criminal cases. In this thrilling detective world, you'll face stressful decision-making moments, reconstruct crime scenes, and utilize cutting-edge technology for evidence analysis.

name: Infinity: HexaDome Tactics
description: Pick your champions and fight in merciless 1v1 turn-based matches. Send your fighters in the arena, position them strategically, create synergies and give the crowd a brutal show! Unlock your ultimate attacks, influence the course of the game and dominate The Hexadome!

name: Touch Your Eyes
description: "Touch Your Eyes" is a puzzle game with a unique approach to pushing boxes. In this game, you will play as a doctor treating various eye patients.

name: Chess For Playdate
description: Play Chess

name: Mr. Mix
description:
An early 90's typing game

A fan-made playable version of Mr. Mix

name: Steel Surge: Revolution
description: Steel Surge: Revolution is a short caravan shmup.

name: Sound Mind
description: In Sound Mind, you and a friend (or a bitter enemy) play as Kaine or Mabel. The goal is simple: Keep all of the inheritance to yourself.

name: Forgotten Runiverse
description:
Forgotten Runiverse is a grand fantasy MMORPG full of magic and wonder based on the lore of Magic Machine's Forgotten Runes Wizard’s Cult NFT Collection. The game is developed and published by Bisonic, Inc.

The Runiverse is open to anyone – begin your adventure, play, create, own land, and earn your place in the pantheon of legends while owning the things you create.

Forgotten Runiverse allows players to adventure across a massive world to discover hidden secrets and quests and hunt a wide array of monsters and creatures for rare treasures and experience on your way to level 50. The rewards from these quests will allow players to craft and forge spells, weapons, armor, houses, decorations and more, each with unique qualities determined by both materials and your mastery of crafting.

Forgotten Runiverse includes on-chain content but does not require a wallet or engaging with the blockchain to play. Early releases of the game will allow users to mint certain cosmetic items to the Arbitrum blockchain to display, trade, or resell. The full release will also include in-game land plots that allow players to help shape the world for everyone by building traveling stations, material gathering stations, housing, or service buildings including forges and mage workshops.

name: Emerald Woods
description:
A combat-less farming sandbox roguelike. Escape modern life to live alone in a mysterious land of forests, lakes, and caverns, inhabited only by strange animals.

In this place, miles away from any other human being, players are free to farm, hunt, build, craft, and scavenge while trying to survive. The game provides new experiences of wonder every time with a fresh new piece of land to explore.

Abandoned buildings where uncanny experiments took place decades ago are scattered all around, and the player can discover what happened there by examining documents and other surviving evidence. A company called Genco used to have its headquarters in the area, what happened to them? there will be a new answer to the question every time a new game is started.

name: Cosplay House
description: In Cosplay House, you inherit a rundown hotel in the bustling city of Lumina. With no previous experience in hospitality and limited funds, you face a daunting challenge. But instead of running a traditional hotel, you decide to turn it into a cosplay house, a unique and trendy establishment catering to the needs of cosplayer cam girls.

name: Unraveling Angel
description:
Unraveling Angel is a choice-based adult visual novel following a bisexual male protagonist in a city that struggles to live and breathe. As the player you make choices that lead him into the arms of one the three love interests; Veronika, Matt and Vice.
Pick the path he follows but know that there's only one universal truth. Behind every door lies a world of hurt, including the correct one.

name: Traitor
description: The Traitor game involves up to 12 players uncovering dark forces in a village, taking on various roles, and testing their intelligence and communication. It transitions between day and night, with unique abilities for each player. The winning team is determined based on tactics and deduction.

name: Silent Hill: The Gallows
description: Fan version of Silent Hill games . Immerse yourself in the world of Silent hill, fight monsters , to survive ..

name: Deus Ex: Malkavian Mod
description: When you base your expectations only on what you see... you blind yourself, to the possibilities of a new mod release: The insanity returns. Old men... are the future.

name: Warlocks Deeds: Uncharted Realms
description: Gain access to various advanced features on Warlocks Deeds, Open up more of the what the world has to offer.

name: Campfire
description: Campfire is a cozy game featuring AI powered NPCs that players can interact with and have a completely non-linear experience.

name: The Invincible: Deluxe Edition
description: Packed with additional content, The Invincible: Deluxe Edition lets you take an even deeper dive into a hard sci-fi adventure. Enjoy the base game along with The Art of The Invincible digital artbook, a digital comic book, and the game's Original Soundtrack.

name: Dora the Explorer: Twins' Day
description: It's Twins Day; Dora, Boots and Dora's puppy Perrito set out on an exciting journey to Play Park for the Twins Day celebration and look for Perrito's twin brother.

name: Full Bloom
description: Full Bloom is a cute adventure game with puzzle and minigame elements! Can you help Bloom leave her room?
